website_summaries.verdict: A simple and beautiful way to keep your coffee hotter longer.
pros: Keeps the coffee hot until the end of the cup
Cool drinks also stay cooler longer
Practical for home use rather than a travel mug
cons: The glass in this mug is thinner than others, which makes it a bit more fragile

customer_reviews.title: Nice to use but be aware and careful
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to compliment our Nespresso coffee maker. They very nice from which to drink a frothed coffee. We first bought two to try and liked them so much we ordered 2 more. The ad and the package state they are dishwasher and microwave safe. After one mug came out of the dishwasher, in which it was carefully place so as to not hit anything, it had water inside the double wall. Kind of like the old trick milk glass. Amazon replaced it with no problem. A second mug disintegrated in my wife's hand when she poured out the water she had heated in it in the microwave. Be careful.
customer_reviews.author: mwells2000

customer_reviews.title: Extremely fragile
customer_reviews.text: This glass is so fragile that you will not believe how easily it will crack. I had hand washed this thing with care, hand dried it and never put it in microwave. But a slight touch against my car keys in my pocket just crumbled the cup. Lasted less than a week
customer_reviews.author: aj0408

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Fragile
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are very nice, but extremely fragile. We bought two, and mine is fine. My wife, after her first use, washed hers by hand and it broke while she washed it. The handle snapped and the glass shattered in the sink causing quite the mess. They seem to be more fragile than a wine glass. I cut myself this morning with a piece that must have missed the sink. Thus the review.....Updated based on my cal lot the manufacture's rep. They replaced the Mug, and were very kind. Still very fragile, so take care. I would compare them to a fine wine glass.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Russo

customer_reviews.title: Not 12-Ounce Capacity - Only 8-Ounce
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these to make 11-ounce macchiatos. They seemed nice, but looked a little small. Using water and a measuring cup I discovered that they only held 8 ounces. Perhaps I received the wrong item, but be advised.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Man

customer_reviews.title: Sexy cups for latte!
customer_reviews.text: When Bodum changed their mug design I was so disappointed! I usually break one or two a year, so they are a perennial gift for myself at Christmas. These mugs by Starfrit arrived very well-packed (I ordered 3), and I am very satisfied with the design and size. They look like they will replace my Bodum mugs and serve me just as well. So glad to find a replacement that I like! My lattes look like a barrista made them just for me every time <3
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Loyd

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty but the lip broke after just 2 weeks. It seems fragile all over.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Microwaveable
customer_reviews.text: A great double wall glass coffee mug and it's microwaveable. However, the specifications did not include this important feature. I had to go on their website to make sure they were microwaveable. This feature should be included in your description. If you add it your sales will increase.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Latvis

customer_reviews.title: Feels so cheap
customer_reviews.text: I was sorely disappointed when I received this mug. It has no heft to it whatsoever making it feel like a children's toy teacup. The handle feels like it would easily just break off the moment I pick it up full of coffee. The way the bottom is curved makes for mixing hot chocolate a bit tricky since it is almost like a trap and hard to get down in there to stir. The cup is also a lot smaller than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Doris

customer_reviews.title: We love 'em
customer_reviews.text: These really work and they're far more reasonably priced than the more well known brand. They keep your drink either hot or cold - whatever you put in, it stays at the temperature a very long time. We're going to buy more and give them as Christmas gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Gearhead

customer_reviews.title: I love this cup
customer_reviews.text: I love this cup. It is just the right size for the expresso I make in my Verissmo coffee machine. I would recommend it to everyone. The coffee stays hot longer and it just feels nice holding the cup. Great mug.
customer_reviews.author: debbie jones

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this cup. I purchased only one at first (testing), but then ordered more. It's elegant and very comfortable to hold.
customer_reviews.author: EKO

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very bad!! They have hole on the bottom and water comes in but can’t get out
customer_reviews.author: orly chen

customer_reviews.title: Great looking cup!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, works great. I just wish it would keep the coffee warmer longer, but other than that, it is great. Also nice looking cup.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: classy
customer_reviews.text: delicate but what we wanted ,functions as advertised I will reorder another, one doesn't fit the bill, they probably should be sold in pairs so we both can have one, great product
customer_reviews.author: Lenraye

customer_reviews.title: Too fragile
customer_reviews.text: The cups seem to keep coffee warm longer, which is good. They are too fragile for everyday use. I cracked one the first time I used them.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald H. Rapee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased two other Starfrit mugs at an earlier time. I liked them well enough to bring the total to four. Nice clean lines, generous handle, easy to grip. Appears more delicate than similar mugs, but is sturdy and stable.
customer_reviews.author: Larue Wunderlich

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: light and elegant - I am waiting to see how they endure over time
customer_reviews.author: Myra Gilliam

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was advertised as a 12 oz. mug, but it barely holds 10 oz. of liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Mattox

customer_reviews.title: Not Right Size
customer_reviews.text: This item is listed as a 12oz. insulated double wall glass mug. The mug is a great mug, but it is only 10oz. , witch I have Plenty of. I still would like to have some 12oz. mugs, just like this one. The mug I recieved was Starfrit Gourmet 12-ounce Double Wall Glass Coffee mug.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmie

customer_reviews.title: So nice mugs
customer_reviews.text: It's so nice to mugs i buy many times and many amout , everybody ask me about it ,shape nice and it reach with no damage
customer_reviews.author: Almulla

customer_reviews.title: Leaky cup. So sad!
customer_reviews.text: So sad about this cup. I’ve always wanted one. The handle is separating from the cup, and water gets in between the insulated layers when I wash it. Very disappointed. It was so pretty.
customer_reviews.author: ROD WINGATE

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design keeps coffee hotter longer.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design that keeps your coffee or favorite hot or cold beverage hotter or colder longer. I especially like the little tip that extends out at the bottom of the handle. It allows me to slide my pinkie under it for greater stability. Most borosilicate cups do not have this feature.
customer_reviews.author: Yusuf

customer_reviews.title: Simply elegant.
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the aesthetic pleasure of glass and the elegant shape of mug and handle when I desire a refreshing sip of tea or fruit juice.
customer_reviews.author: Loblee

customer_reviews.title: Starfrit Double Wall Glass Coffee mug, 12-Ounce.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these Coffee Mugs .... in the event one would break, I have a back-up. The coffee stays hot much longer than before. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Great mug
customer_reviews.text: Have had these glass mugs for several days and I am very pleased with both their performance and appearance. Had been looking for something besides metal or plastic. In fact, I am ordering two more. PROS Keeps coffee warm, much better than any of my earthware or porcelain. Well designed without any apparent seams on the handle or lip, just very smooth. Light and nice to handle, stylish. Not too expensive when comparing to insulated mugs. CONS Since I have only used these for a week or so I can not comment about their durability.
customer_reviews.author: sierrasun

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: We had one chip rather easily. Other than that, it is good.
customer_reviews.author: bored housewife

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy! No durability at all. There should be a zero stars option.
customer_reviews.author: Ray T.

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery and cute mug
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. Cute and a god price. I have not use it yet because I bought it from my mom. It doesn't fit as much liquid as they stated.
customer_reviews.author: Maria J. Addison

customer_reviews.title: The pics make it look very nice.
customer_reviews.text: But it is a bit top-heavy, and cannot hold the advertised twelve ounces if one desires a bit of 'free-board' to avoid spillage.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Wiersema II

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: liked them but the price was not a good deal for me, I returned these.
customer_reviews.author: WANDA

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: it is elegant well fished and it gives drinks a delightful site
customer_reviews.author: Kebeer

customer_reviews.title: Great cups!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE these cups!! Use them EVERY DAY!! They keep my coffee or tea drinkable for quite a long time. The size is perfect, and the lip is very easy to drink from!
customer_reviews.author: Penelope

customer_reviews.title: great BUT I stronly recommend anyone wanting this to get ...
customer_reviews.text: great BUT I stronly recommend anyone wanting this to get the largest size. The heavier bottom glass reduces the fluid quantity rapidly
customer_reviews.author: mohan nathan

customer_reviews.title: NOT DISHWASHER SAFE!
customer_reviews.text: The mugs are NOT DISHWASHER SAFE. After 4 months water began accumulating between the walls rendering the mugs useless. Don't buy!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Rankey

customer_reviews.title: glass is good
customer_reviews.text: Have accidently hit this on a hard surface on the side of the cup and it did not break. Just do not like the lip on bottom of handle.
customer_reviews.author: NB Woolard

customer_reviews.title: wasted
customer_reviews.text: too delicate - one tap-and it broke Reordered and 2nd one broke too! wasted $50
customer_reviews.author: Reef Runner

customer_reviews.title: She loved the gift but it's not glass
customer_reviews.text: This is not glass! She loved the gift but it's not glass.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

product_meta.title: Starfrit 080056-006-FOAM 12-Ounce Double-Wall Glass Coffee Cup, Clear
feature_bullets: Great Item To Give as A Gift.
